summary: It is summer holidays in the late 1950s and a fun fair comes to Wall-Entuna. All children obviously want to go there including Lilla Jönssonligan. Sickan then obviously has a plan for how to get hold of hundreds of "free tickets".
cast: Kalle Eriksson|Jonathan Flumee|Fredrik Glimskär|Jonna Sohlmér|Anders Öström|Mats Wennberg|Robert Gustafsson|Johan Rabaeus|Ulla Skoog|Loa Falkman|Maria Weisby|Micke Dubois|Peter Harryson|Olof Thunberg|Niklas Falk|Cecilia Nilsson|Isak Ekblom|Freja Berglund|Erik Lindman|Stefan Göstasson|Christer Andersson|Stefan Thunberg|Carl Svernlöv|Lasse Larsson|Arne Palm|Per Mellander|Jeff Ahl|Hans Viwin|Malin Nilsson|Lennart Ersson|Anna-Therese Eivindsdottir|Karl O. keywords: prequel|second part|prequel and sequel|younger version of character|eastern europe
title: Lilla Jönssonligan på styva linan
